<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Rain-Scribe](/NPCs.aspx?ID=971)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

_This sharp-eyed half-elf wears weather-beaten gear that would easily blend in with any natural terrain, and carries an elaborately carved walking staff._

 When a group of adepts leaves the Magaambya, whether to investigate a magical phenomenon, conduct a diplomatic mission, or visit scholars in a distant land, a Rain-Scribe often serves as their guide. An expert in travel through difficult environments, the Rain-Scribe provides for their companions while helping them avoid the many hazards of travel in the Inner Sea. Rain-Scribes are some of the most well-traveled members of the academy, and most have secured alliances or promises of safe passage through the lands where they walk.

 Should the Rain-Scribe or their companions be attacked on their journeys, the scribe is a capable combatant who strives to turn their communion with the natural world into their greatest advantage in battle. Whether by using primal magic against their foes or striking unseen from the underbrush, the Rain-Scribe assures that no opponent threatens their traveling companions for long.

[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), _scroll of [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)_

</column>

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +12 

+1 status to all saves vs. poison
</row>

**HP** 54

**Resistances**
poison 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet (from [_longstrider_](/Spells.aspx?ID=175))

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +9 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+1 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 21, attack +11
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) (×2), [Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175) (already cast)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299)

**Druid Order Spells** DC 21, 2 Focus Points
- **2nd**
[Tempest Surge](/Spells.aspx?ID=479)

**Chameleon Step** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The Rain-Scribe must be in natural terrain. **Effect** The Rain- Scribe shifts their coloration and the coloration of their gear to match the surroundings and then immediately [Sneaks](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), even while being observed. The Rain-Scribe must end their movement [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or behind cover to remain [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Kamou Odhiambo</title>

Kamou's merchant family has traveled to cities across the Mwangi Expanse, and Kamou has put his kin's secret routes and trading alliances to good use when escorting others through the wilderness.
</aside>
